categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Fleet Admiral was a high-ranked position in several navies in the galaxy, including the Imperial Navy and New Republic Defense Fleet. In the Imperial Navy, a fleet admiral was superior to an admiral and inferior to a Grand Admiral. However, in the New Republic, the rank was the highest naval position which was in command of the entire starfleet.

Prior to 2 BBY, Sartan held the rank of Fleet Admiral, as well as Jok Donassius. Firmus Piett served as Fleet Admiral prior to the Battle of Endor. At some point after, the rank of Fleet Admiral was given to Gallius Rax, a friend of and close advisor to Emperor Sheev Palpatine. After the death of Palpatine during the Battle of Endor, Rax promoted Admiral Rae Sloane to the position for her actions during the Rebellion on Akiva, but later promoted her again to Grand Admiral.
Following the Battle of Endor, Admiral Gial Ackbar of the New Republic Defense Fleet was promoted to the rank of Fleet Admiral.
